trigger_description: This trigger fires when your device hasn't reported for 20 minutes.
This trigger fires when a given parameter falls below a certain threshold.
This trigger fires when the UV Index rises above a given value.
This trigger fires when a given parameter exceed a given threshold.
This trigger fires when the Daily Rain measurement rises above a given threshold.
This trigger fires when the outdoor temperature rises above a given value.
This trigger fires when the Outdoor Temperature falls below a given value.
This trigger fires when the wind speed rises above a given value.
